document_data.name: ''Hamarhraft''
document_data.mainbody: '''Hamarhraft''' was an [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[maul]] of [[dwarven]] origin that had been imbued with the power of thunder.
document_data.Description: The great hammer had an inscription, written in [[dwarvish]], that alluded to the importance of making a strong first impression.
document_data.Powers: Whenever the wielded of ''Hamarhraft'' leapt or jumped onto the group, their landing was followed by a thunderous wave that extended out {{SI|9.84|ft}}.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, ''Hamarhraft'' could be found within a locked chest in one of the upper floors of the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn. It was not entirely clear who remained in possession of the hammer.
